title: Mobile Gamification Program for Enhancing Chinese Character Structure Recognition

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic Chinese character structures and radical concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical training for applying Chinese character teaching methods for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can assemble compound Chinese characters with 80% or higher accuracy using radical components.
Learners can identify 15 or more structural patterns of Chinese characters during collaborative problem-solving processes.
Learners can enhance learning effectiveness by 20% through peer feedback interactions performed at least three times in a gamified environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
